knimeNode.name: ActMolecule to Molecule
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts an Actelion molecule column to a molecule string representation (SDF or Mol File) and appends it to the table.

fullDescription.intro: Converts an Actelion molecule column to a molecule string representation (SDF or Mol File) and appends it to the table.
fullDescription.option: The column containing the Actelion molecules
The name of the column that will contain the string representation of the molecules
If checked, the input column will be replaced by the new column

ports.inPort: Input table containing the Actelion molecule representation in one column
ports.outPort: Table containing the string representation of the molecules in an added column
